statement.p: In 12.77 of the last 47 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{47}}={0.1277}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{47}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1277}\cdot{47}={6.0019}. We round that as requested to 6 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
